Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

programme.title: Kafanica blizu SiS-a
programme.desc: Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Villa Maria
Vila Marija
programme.desc: With Jelena Veljaca, Damir Markovina, Zarko Radic, Ksenija Pajic. The first-ever Croatian soap opera which follows the lives of three bourgeois families that are tied together, but even more separated by the money, love, passion and betrayal.

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Dramska serija Ljubav u zaleđu obiteljska je priča čija se radnja odvija u prepoznatljivoj zagrebačkoj urbanoj sredini. U središtu priče dva su naraštaja triju obitelji povezanih nogometom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz nogomet. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao nogometaši, jedan je postao uspješan trener, a posljednji je u menedžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane. Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovno u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže nogomet i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Usporedno pratimo i živote njihove djece, koji su odrastali pod utjecajem nogometa, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je, dakako, ljubav dvoje mladih, nogometaša Marka Marušića i slikarice Nine Radić. Njihova je ljubavna priča puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke. Brak je kad dvoje ljudi zajedno rešavaju probleme koje nikad ne bi imali da nisu zajedno...oni se stalno svađaju, ali ne bi valjalo da je drugačije...oni su razdvojeni, ali žive u istom stanu...oni su sretni u svađama, neverovatni u neurozi i nemoćni smisliti argument za svoje ili tuđe ponašanje...kada ljubav postane navika da li sve postaje panika...Dogodovštine jedne beogradske porodice dočaraće otac Mića i majka Vera, koji su razvedeni, ali igrom slučaja, prisiljeni živeti pod istim krovom sa dve ćerke - studentkinjom Majom i srednjoškolkom Janjom. S obzirom da je majka psihijatarkinja, kroz njihovu kuću prolazi paleta različitih pacijenata, a nerazdvojni deo porodičnog miljea je i komšija Jovanović, koji samo na izgled deluje nervozno, a u stvari tvrdi da je najnormalniji od cele porodice.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca,... Već znamo da je "Agencija za sve i svašta" vlasotinačko preduzeće koje rešava sve probleme svojih klijenata. Osnivač i vlasnik firme je Spiridon Don Karamarković, nekadašnji pripadnik Legije stranaca, ekspert za sva pitanja i najškrtiji gazda na svetu. Deda mu je rekao da svaki uspešan Srbin mora da ima kafanu i on je ove godine osnovao svoju. Poslove oko kafane poverio je misterioznoj Madam Žaklini koja je naše gore list, ali je ugostiteljsko znanje sticala u Parizu.

programme.title: M(j)ešoviti brak
programme.desc: Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Serija "M(j)ešoviti brak" snimljena je na osnovu istoimene pozorišne predstave koja spada među najgledanije poslednjih godina. Naravno, dodati su novi likovi, proširena je priča, a gastarbajterska porodica Čađenovic vratila se u novu državu, Srbiju i Crnu Goru. Čuli su za promene, pa su odlučili da posle više godina boravka u Lucernu, u Švajcarskoj, teško zarađene devize ulože u bisnis u Beogradu. Sasvim slucajno, prvi kadrovi ove serije snimljeni su u državi koja se zvala Jugoslavija, a prva epizoda završena je u državi, koja se poput ovog mešovitog braka Crnogorca i Srpkinje, zove Srbija i Crna Gora.

programme.title: Pare ili život
programme.desc: "Pare ili život" prati glavne likove iz istoimene serije i njihovu nezaboravnu ljetnju avanturu u najljepšim predelima crnogorskog Primorja. "Pare ili život" je dramska, komična TV serija koja prati nekoliko različitih karaktera u sudaru s našom svakodnevnicom. Dramski realizam ove serije nekad se graniči s apsurdom, ali oslobođen je humora po svaku cenu i radije problematizuje neke socijalne fenomene. U društvu koje priželjkuje da je tranzicija već gotova, a ona tek što je počela, javljaju se brojne zamke za sve one koji se "nisu snašli". A Miki, Džoni, Višnja, Sunčica, Marun, Maja i Časlav, nisu sposobni da u novim okolnostima uspeju poput oca njihovog prijatelja Gagija. Razlozi za to nisu ni vaspitanje, ni "devedesete", ni komunizam (pa toliki zakleti komunisti veoma lako su postali uspešni kapitalisti). Na putu do uspeha smetaju im veliko srce i slab stomak. Svi njihovi poduhvati tužni su do smeha, jer je svako raspet između prevaziđenog osećanja zajedništva i želje za ličnim uspehom. Ipak, kad se u njihovim životima pojavi raspevani sanjar Džoni, počinje da se stvara jedna čudna porodica gde svi oni, hteli to ili ne, ostvaruju mnogo jače veze od onih rodbinskih. I usput dobijaju možda mnogo vredniju nagradu od one za kojom sve vreme jure.

programme.title: Premijer
programme.desc: Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Formira se nova vlada Srbije, godina je 2015.! Budući Premijer je narodski čovjek. Prije političkog angažiranja, malo je bio poznat u narodu, bavio se književnošću i narodnim umotvorinama. Čak ni televizija koja 2015. godine objavljuje rezultate izbora nije imala njegovu sliku. Međutim, kada je postao premijer, malo-pomalo, bivao je simpatičan običnom narodu. Umjesto napisanih političkih govora, on je govorio prosto, služeći se izrekama i tako postao vrlo popularan lik, omiljen u narodu. PREMIJER je sitkom serija na temu lica i naličja politike i političara. Junaci PREMIJERA iza viskokih državnih funkcija kriju ljudske mane i vrline, i mi pokušavamo, u neskrivenom nušićevskom maniru, da iznesemo pred gledatelji smiješnu a ponekad i gorku stranu osobnosti onih koji odlučuju o sudbini naroda i zemlje.

programme.title: Vila Marija
programme.desc: Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je... Porodici Jurak nacionalizovan je veći deo imovine nakon Drugog svetskog rata, ali svejedno nisu ostali siromašni. Stanuju u dobrom zagrebačkom kvartu. Tomislav Jurak (Žarko Radić) je pedesetogodišnjak, vodi porodični biznis koji uključuje lanac restorana i hotel u centru grada, koji je počeo da gradi još u vreme socijalizma, ali ga je u vlasništvo preuzeo tokom privatizacije devedesetih novcem svoje tete Mitzy. Njegova žena Ana Jurak (Ksenija Pajić), u ranim četrdesetim, rodila mu je dvoje dece- Ivana i Doru. Ana je napustila studije prava kad ga je upoznala i posvetila se brizi o porodici i uz pomoć kućne pomoćnice, brizi o samoj sebi-shopping, bazen i tračanje, omiljene su joj obaveze. Kako god bilo, ona je u svakom slučaju temelj familije. Ćerka Dora (Jelena Veljača) ima 20 godina i studira ekonomiju. Otac je obožava i ne prihvata činjenicu da je već odavno došla u godine da ima dečka i svoju intimu. Razmažena tatina kćer. Ivan (Mislav Čavajda) radi s ocem u firmi. Zgodan zagrebački dečko, dvadesetpetogodišnjak, ali neodgovoran, sklon porocima, ukratko, loš karakter lepog lica. S druge strane, nalazi se porodica bankara Maksa Lovreka (Ante Čedo Martinić), koji Jurakovoj firmi daje veliki kredit za preuzimanje malotrgovinskog lanca. On i Tomislav Jurak (ne)prijatelji su još od falultetskih dana. Uz posao, Jurakovi i Lovrekovi povezani su i privatno, a razdoblje prividnog prijateljstva s početka priče ubrzo prerasta u suparništvo. Max Lovrek oženjen je Vesnom Lovrek (Barbara Vicković), ženom sumnjivog karaktera, koja je pritom Maksu neverna. Bankar Lovrek iz prvog braka ima sina Svena (Sven Madžarević), 2o godišnjaka, prilično povučenog, skromnog dečka. Maks kuje zaveru protiv Juraka s Jurakovim ambicioznim sinom Ivanom. Treća glavna ekipa su bolesna majka Dunja (Nada Gačešić Livaković) i njen sin Luka (Damir Markovina), pametan i obrazovan mladić koji neumorno radi kod Jurakovih, ali ne razume da ga oni iskorištavaju. Ima i razloga za slepilo: voli Jurakovu ćerku, Doru. Njihovu vezu Tomislav Jurak nikad ne bi dopustio...

programme.title: Ljubav u zaleđu
programme.desc: U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. U središtu priče su dve generacije triju porodica povezanih fudbalom. Serija prati živote četvorice mladića iz predgrađa koji su odrasli uz fudbal. Dvojica od njih napravili su profesionalne karijere kao fudbaleri, jedan je postao uspešan trener, a poslednji je u menadžerskim vodama. U mladosti, na vrhuncu karijere, jedan od mladića tragično je izgubio život, nakon čega su ostale životni putevi odveli na različite strane.Serija počinje dvadeset pet godina kasnije kad su svi ponovo u Zagrebu. Osim što ih veže fudbal i zajednička prošlost, likovi serije su i u složenim emotivnim odnosima. Paralelno se prate i životi njihove dece, koji su odrastali pod uticajem fudbala, te su često opterećeni prošlošću svojih roditelja. U središtu je ljubav dvoje mladih, fudbalera Marka Marušića i slikarke Nine Radić. Njihova ljubavna priča je puna prepreka i zapleta zbog različitih sredina i naizgled nespojivih životnih stilova.

programme.title: Ljubav, navika, panika
programme.desc: Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Humoristična serija "Ljubav, navika, panika" donosi priču o jednoj beogradskoj porodici koju čine otac Mića, majka Vera i njihove dvije kćeri Maja i Janja. Iako su razvedeni, prisiljeni su živjeti pod istim krovom, a tu dolazi do brojnih rasprava i svađa.

programme.title: National Security

programme.title: Zlatni kompas
programme.desc: Dvanaestogodišnja Lyra Belacqua (Dakota Blue Richards) krenula je u potragu za svojom najboljom prijateljicom, a završit će u misiji spašavanja svijeta, i to ne samo svoga. Snimljena prema prvom dijelu nagrađivane trilogije Philipa Pullmana "Njegove tamne tvari", smještena u paralelni svemir gdje se znanost isprepleće s magijom. Dvanaestogodišnja Lyra Belacqua (D. Blue Richards) hita u pomoć svom najboljem prijatelju, no naposljetku se nađe u veličanstvenoj misiji da spasi ne samo svoj svijet nego i naš i sve ostale svjetove...

programme.desc:

Richter"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Stealth","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi596312345","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQxYzBkNzAtYWE2YS00MjViLWJlNzEtNjEyMjZhNDI4MzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWQxYzBkNzAtYWE2YS00MjViLWJlNzEtNjEyMjZhNDI4MzFhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures"},"datePublished":"2005-09-14","description":"Deeply ensconced in a top-secret military program, three pilots struggle to bring an artificial intelligence program under control before it initiates the next world war.","keywords":"aircraft cockpit,missile attack,captain,lieutenant,vertical take off and landing aircraft","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382992/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"wittmann73"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Worse than Pearl Harbor","reviewBody":"Wow, when you think you have seen all bad films another one comes around the corner and takes the cake. This film is as dump as a stump and a new low after the mess called Pearl Harbor.

We see some handsome actors walking around in USAF costumes, pretending to be pilots. They talk a lot of rubbish in front of blue screens ("War is teamwork", "We are the elite", blah blah blah). Of course there is also some time to invade other countries and bomb some stuff. God bless the USAF! Hooray!

Add some stupid plot that no one cares about after 2 minutes and you have a big fat turkey of a movie. Hey Hollywood, we don't need more propaganda movies! This is "Top Gun" for idiots. 1/10"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":52401,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.1},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

"},"datePublished":"2011-04-29","description":"Dominic Toretto and his crew of street racers plan a massive heist to buy their freedom while in the sights of a powerful Brazilian drug lord and a dangerous federal agent.","keywords":"heist,safe,rio de janeiro brazil,leg,policewoman","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1596343/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tmm_8705"},"dateCreated":"2013-06-28","inLanguage":"English","name":"So far the best and most entertaining of this series.","reviewBody":"This is the film that single-handedly got me to give the rest of the series a shot, for better or worse. It's a nice change of pace from the previous films where it abandons the street race angle (how far could you have taken that anyway?) and goes into the direction of a heist action flick with cars. Dwayne Johnson is a great addition and really adds to the series embracing the goofiness of its premise. So yeah, still the best this franchise had, and that's kind of rare for a franchise on its fifth film. The action for the most part is really handled well and a lot of fun to watch. The cast as an ensemble are very charismatic which no doubt makes it more fun for audiences to see a cast that has so much diversity and it's not done with generic stereotypes but just a bunch of people with a common interest. Overall a very entertaining action flick.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":360092,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Furious 6
Brzi i žestoki 6
programme.desc:
Furious 6: Directed by Justin Lin. With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster. Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1905041/","name":"Furious 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTg2NDQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc2NzQzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3225003545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":" Agent Hobbs enlists the aid of Dom and team to help bring a rival gang, led by Owen Shaw, to justice. In exchange for clear records, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost. "},"datePublished":"2013-05-22","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Movin' on up!","reviewBody":"While most franchises lose their steam with each succeeding sequel, the Fast and the Furious franchise is that rare exception where its later films breathe in new life into the series. Once a franchise about car racing, "Fast Five" took an unexpected turn as a bank heist thriller in the vein of Steven Soderbergh's "Ocean's 11," a welcomed change as seen by its huge box office earnings and critical success. Now, "Furious 6" is neither about car racing nor bank heists, but rather a terrorist threat with obvious inspirations from "The Dark Knight." Like "Fast Five," the results are immensely satisfying and undeniably entertaining.

The key to the franchise's upward turn in quality is due to director Justin Lin. He is a skilled action director, and many filmmakers can learn a few things or two from him: The action sequences are impressive, engaging, comprehensible, and well-shot, with practical effects to boot. There is a sense of danger, verve, and life in these scenes rarely found in other films, despite how over-the-top and ridiculous they may be; and yes, they often drift into gratify-defying territory. While I usually don't react out loudly when watching a film, this film had me gasping, jaw dropping, laughing, and applauding, sometimes all at once!

Another ingredient to the film's success is the chemistry between the cast members. We have grown to love these characters over the course of the series that one cannot help but cheer on for them. In particular, Tyrese Gibson and Ludicrous have such a terrific rapport with each other that they provide some of the film's biggest laughs and memorable one-liners. Additionally, Luke Evans is definitely a step up above the previous film's antagonist, and Gina Carano provides some great ass-kicking moments, although not much performance-wise. On another note, I want to mention how refreshing it is to see minority actors fill these roles. Certainly, the film's use of a diverse ensemble cast should be commended. As for the story, it's nothing special, but I dare you not to act surprised when several plot twists are revealed; I did so more than I would like to admit.

If there's one thing to learn about this franchise, it's that some change can be a good thing. While the later sequels do focus away from the car racing, they still featured cars, which helped retain old fans while bringing in new ones. "Furious 6" is terrific entertainment, and judging by yet another dazzling cliffhanger and the audience's reaction, "Fast & Furious 7" will be an amazing finale for the series. Unfortunately, Justin Lin won't be back around for the last installment, but someone please get this man to direct every and all upcoming action flicks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":375399,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

","datePublished":"2013-05-22","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy","dateCreated":"2013-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Movin' on up!","reviewBody":"While most franchises lose their steam with each succeeding sequel, the Fast and the Furious franchise is that rare exception where its later films breathe in new life into the series. Once a franchise about car racing, "Fast Five" took an unexpected turn as a bank heist thriller in the vein of Steven Soderbergh's "Ocean's 11," a welcomed change as seen by its huge box office earnings and critical success. Now, "Furious 6" is neither about car racing nor bank heists, but rather a terrorist threat with obvious inspirations from "The Dark Knight." Like "Fast Five," the results are immensely satisfying and undeniably entertaining.

The key to the franchise's upward turn in quality is due to director Justin Lin. He is a skilled action director, and many filmmakers can learn a few things or two from him: The action sequences are impressive, engaging, comprehensible, and well-shot, with practical effects to boot. There is a sense of danger, verve, and life in these scenes rarely found in other films, despite how over-the-top and ridiculous they may be; and yes, they often drift into gratify-defying territory. While I usually don't react out loudly when watching a film, this film had me gasping, jaw dropping, laughing, and applauding, sometimes all at once!

Another ingredient to the film's success is the chemistry between the cast members. We have grown to love these characters over the course of the series that one cannot help but cheer on for them. In particular, Tyrese Gibson and Ludicrous have such a terrific rapport with each other that they provide some of the film's biggest laughs and memorable one-liners. Additionally, Luke Evans is definitely a step up above the previous film's antagonist, and Gina Carano provides some great ass-kicking moments, although not much performance-wise. On another note, I want to mention how refreshing it is to see minority actors fill these roles. Certainly, the film's use of a diverse ensemble cast should be commended. As for the story, it's nothing special, but I dare you not to act surprised when several plot twists are revealed; I did so more than I would like to admit.

If there's one thing to learn about this franchise, it's that some change can be a good thing. programme.title: Ninja s Beverly Hillsa
programme.desc: Priča o siročetu koje je nađeno u Japanu i odgojeno u tajnom japanskom dojou. Ninje misle da je to dijete Veliki bijeli ninja Haru (Chris Farley) čiji je dolazak zapisan u legendi. Ninje misle kako je Haru (Chris Farley) dijete Velikog bijelog ninje čiji je dolazak zapisan u legendi. Haru se ima priliku dokazati kada ga prelijepa Alison (Nicollette Sheridan) nagovori da se upusti u opasnu misiju na Beverly Hillsu. Uz pomoć brata ninje i prijatelja Amerikanca, Haru uvidi da ga očekuje puno odgovornija uloga od one kakvu je zamišljao.

programme.title: Furious 6
Brzi i žestoki 6
programme.desc:
Furious 6: Directed by Justin Lin. With Vin Diesel, Paul Walker, Dwayne Johnson, Jordana Brewster. Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1905041/","name":"Furious 6","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTM3NTg2NDQzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjc2NzQzOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0004874/","name":"Vin Diesel"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0908094/","name":"Paul Walker"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0425005/","name":"Dwayne Johnson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510912/","name":"Justin Lin"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005073/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142678/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0011134/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0604555/","name":"Chris Morgan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0860155/","name":"Gary Scott Thompson"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Theatrical Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi3225003545","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzcxMjgxODEzNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTQyNjEzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":" Agent Hobbs enlists the aid of Dom and team to help bring a rival gang, led by Owen Shaw, to justice. In exchange for clear records, they must put an end to their schemes, no matter how personal the cost. "},"datePublished":"2013-05-22","description":"Hobbs has Dominic and Brian reassemble their crew to take down a team of mercenaries: Dominic unexpectedly gets sidetracked with facing his presumed deceased girlfriend, Letty.","keywords":"canary islands,reference to spain,reference to the incredible hulk,humvee,brian o'conner character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1905041/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"moviewizguy"},"dateCreated":"2013-05-16","inLanguage":"English","name":"Movin' on up!","reviewBody":"While most franchises lose their steam with each succeeding sequel, the Fast and the Furious franchise is that rare exception where its later films breathe in new life into the series. Once a franchise about car racing, "Fast Five" took an unexpected turn as a bank heist thriller in the vein of Steven Soderbergh's "Ocean's 11," a welcomed change as seen by its huge box office earnings and critical success. Now, "Furious 6" is neither about car racing nor bank heists, but rather a terrorist threat with obvious inspirations from "The Dark Knight." Like "Fast Five," the results are immensely satisfying and undeniably entertaining.

The key to the franchise's upward turn in quality is due to director Justin Lin. He is a skilled action director, and many filmmakers can learn a few things or two from him: The action sequences are impressive, engaging, comprehensible, and well-shot, with practical effects to boot. There is a sense of danger, verve, and life in these scenes rarely found in other films, despite how over-the-top and ridiculous they may be; and yes, they often drift into gratify-defying territory. While I usually don't react out loudly when watching a film, this film had me gasping, jaw dropping, laughing, and applauding, sometimes all at once!

Another ingredient to the film's success is the chemistry between the cast members. We have grown to love these characters over the course of the series that one cannot help but cheer on for them. In particular, Tyrese Gibson and Ludicrous have such a terrific rapport with each other that they provide some of the film's biggest laughs and memorable one-liners. Additionally, Luke Evans is definitely a step up above the previous film's antagonist, and Gina Carano provides some great ass-kicking moments, although not much performance-wise. On another note, I want to mention how refreshing it is to see minority actors fill these roles. Certainly, the film's use of a diverse ensemble cast should be commended. As for the story, it's nothing special, but I dare you not to act surprised when several plot twists are revealed; I did so more than I would like to admit.

If there's one thing to learn about this franchise, it's that some change can be a good thing. While the later sequels do focus away from the car racing, they still featured cars, which helped retain old fans while bringing in new ones. "Furious 6" is terrific entertainment, and judging by yet another dazzling cliffhanger and the audience's reaction, "Fast & Furious 7" will be an amazing finale for the series. Unfortunately, Justin Lin won't be back around for the last installment, but someone please get this man to direct every and all upcoming action flicks.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":375399,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7},"duration":"PT2H10M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc:

Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2170439/","name":"Horrible Bosses 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYzFjYWVhYzYtMDZjNi00ZTc5LTk1MWQtNTBlZTA1MDFhMzY3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjQ2MjQ5NzM@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000867/","name":"Jason Bateman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0837177/","name":"Jason Sudeikis"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0206359/","name":"Charlie Day"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0044439/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0430860/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1890845/","name":"Sean Anders"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1898234/","name":"John Morris"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0326246/","name":"Jonathan Goldstein"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi965259033","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA0ODgzMDEzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDM4MTI4MjE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjA0ODgzMDEzN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNDM4MTI4MjE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.
"},"datePublished":"2014-11-26","description":"Dale, Kurt and Nick decide to start their own business but things don't go as planned because of a slick investor, prompting the trio to pull off a harebrained and misguided kidnapping scheme.","keywords":"scene during end credits,sex addict,sex tape,singing in a car,reference to franz beckenbauer","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2170439/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paulwattriley"},"dateCreated":"2014-12-12","inLanguage":"English","name":"Its a slapstick comedy","reviewBody":"For heavens sake it is a slapstick comedy and contains enough funny scenes to achieve its purpose.

Cant imagine what some people expect and the people that say they didn't laugh until the end credits well I actually feel sorry for you. It must be depressing to be unable to laugh at childish adult humour. 

I personally found the film enjoyable but I must admit I am a big child at heart and see comedy films as they as supposed to be.

Is this is greatest film of the year NO but it is far from being the worst film of the year.

I will most likely watch this again with my nephew who has the same sense of humour as myself and sure he will love the film.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":161551,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.3},"duration":"PT1H48M"}</script><metacontent="

Cant imagine what some people expect and the people that say they didn't laugh until the end credits well I actually feel sorry for you. It must be depressing to be unable to laugh at childish adult humour.

programme.title: A Life Less Ordinary
Sasvim neobičan život
programme.desc:
A Life Less Ordinary: Directed by Danny Boyle. With Holly Hunter, Delroy Lindo, Dan Hedaya, Cameron Diaz. Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119535/","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjRiMDhmNTctNGJiYi00MTQ5LTg2N2YtMGQ1NDQyNzU4OWIwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQ4NDY5OTc@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Fantasy"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000191/","name":"Ewan McGregor"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000456/","name":"Holly Hunter"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000965/","name":"Danny Boyle"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103532/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0103732/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030612/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0388076/","name":"John Hodge"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"A Life Less Ordinary","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2511601945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDc5NDY4ZDYtN2Q2Zi00MmJhLTk1NjItODM1NWM5YjQ5ODAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"1997-10-24","description":"Upon being fired, a desperate guy kidnaps a daughter of his former boss. Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.","keywords":"angel,hostage,kidnapping,robot,janitor","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119535/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"RNHunter"},"dateCreated":"2005-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Magical Movie","reviewBody":"I just love watching movies where I do not expect excellence - and yet there it is. I was very happy with a Life Less Ordinary. It seemed to me to be unique, charming, fun and just a great way to spend some enjoyable time.

When a movie gets this enjoyable, I need to ask why. In my opinion in this movie its "casting" was exceptional. And of course one then has to credit directing that puts the cast at their best. Clearly Ewan McGregor and Cameron Diaz can both be characters. Well, this is a movie that puts them at their best, funniest and most charming. The director also brings out their unique features as an actor and actress that just makes the movie enjoyable.

The highlight of this kidnapping movie is also unexpected. It for me was the song and dance routine with Ewan and Cameron. They were great - fun and charming.

This is a movie that I will want to watch again and again.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34626,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

Two angels are sent to Earth to check if love is possible in this case.","keywords":"angel,hostage,kidnapping,robot,janitor","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119535/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"RNHunter","dateCreated":"2005-09-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Magical Movie","reviewBody":"I just love watching movies where I do not expect excellence - and yet there it is. I was very happy with a Life Less Ordinary. It seemed to me to be unique, charming, fun and just a great way to spend some enjoyable time.

When a movie gets this enjoyable, I need to ask why. In my opinion in this movie its "casting" was exceptional. And of course one then has to credit directing that puts the cast at their best. Clearly Ewan McGregor and Cameron Diaz can both be characters. Well, this is a movie that puts them at their best, funniest and most charming. The director also brings out their unique features as an actor and actress that just makes the movie enjoyable.

The highlight of this kidnapping movie is also unexpected. It for me was the song and dance routine with Ewan and Cameron. They were great - fun and charming.

This is a movie that I will want to watch again and again.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":34626,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.4,"duration":"PT1H43M"</script><metacontent="

children,crocodile","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0494238/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Growlyted"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fairly faithful, but bad ending.","reviewBody":"Cornelia Funke is my favourite author and so I was nervous about the transfer to the screen. I knew there would be inevitable cuts and changes, which could take the heart out of the story. The actors (with the exception of Helen Mirren) didn't match what I had in my head. Could they capture the in depth personalities? 

As it turned out, my casting concerns were unfounded, although there was an annoying line from Capricorn. (In the trailer, unfortunately.) The cuts are noticeable, but acceptable. Same goes for the majority of changes. I enjoyed the first two sections, but then came the ending. I won't say how it's changed, but it was WRONG. In fact it was so WRONG, that there will be difficulties sequel-wise.

The best way to enjoy Inkheart is to lose yourself in the book. I hope this film encourages viewers to do just that.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74624,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.","keywords":"blind character,private school,tango,philogyny,loss of eyesight","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105323/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Docterry"},"dateCreated":"2002-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Film For The Lonely","reviewBody":"There's something about this film that keeps you company. It's like you're also spending the weekend with Colonel Slade. The film entertains your darkest notions and tops your depth of grief and then somehow elevates you to find hope amidst our consciously blind existence. 

At first I had a problem with Pacino's performance. I thought Al was definitely over-acting. He's playing a man who is consciously suicidal, a man suffering the loss of his dependence. He seems preoccupied in fulfilling a sexual desire but what he really yearns for is the acceptance of a woman now that he's been injured. However, even beyond his glorified apparition of woman what he presently needs is someone, anyone who will listen. He needs someone he can bark orders at like in the past. Some babe in the woods he can bemuse and corrupt amidst the decadence of `Freak Show Central', his personal nickname for New York City. In this contrived situation he finds life again and with these considerations Pacino's bravura performance is forgivable. 

Pacino ironically switches energies with O'Donnell's character being the Colonel's high energy defuses Charlie's depressed low energy. The Colonel is psyched for his weekend's desperate romp, `A little tour of pleasures', he says. Given this distinction in performances, Charlie should have been the suicidal one, the defeated one because O'Donnell walks around this film like a deer caught in the headlights and there really isn't anything inspiring or motivating about him. It would have been an awesome acting exercise to have a young actor go against Pacino and realistically attempt to change his character's suicidal mission, granted his whole outlook on life yet what we have is a quick resolution that is very intense but not very intellectual. 

In the end, this movie somehow manages to conduct all it's emotional payoffs thus rendering the viewer at the mercy of what may seem bathos. Many have criticized the film as negotiating Hollywood Plot A with Plot B or C. However, the Colonel realizes his biggest failure in life was in his interpersonal relationships. He learns that sometimes having friends can be a stronger and more important bond than family- a point well taken. Sometimes when a film comes together, after all the pre and post production, the result can be undeniably charming and this film manages to soar above its foundations, those manifested in the most basic of premises of melodrama. `Scent Of A Woman' does inevitably work and it's a very heart-warming film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":273092,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"duration":"PT2H36M"}</script><metacontent="

money agrees to "babysit" a blind man, but the job is not at all what he anticipated.","keywords":"blind character,private school,tango,philogyny,loss of eyesight","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0105323/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Docterry"},"dateCreated":"2002-06-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"A Film For The Lonely","reviewBody":"There's something about this film that keeps you company. It's like you're also spending the weekend with Colonel Slade. The film entertains your darkest notions and tops your depth of grief and then somehow elevates you to find hope amidst our consciously blind existence. 

At first I had a problem with Pacino's performance. I thought Al was definitely over-acting. He's playing a man who is consciously suicidal, a man suffering the loss of his dependence. He seems preoccupied in fulfilling a sexual desire but what he really yearns for is the acceptance of a woman now that he's been injured. However, even beyond his glorified apparition of woman what he presently needs is someone, anyone who will listen. He needs someone he can bark orders at like in the past. Some babe in the woods he can bemuse and corrupt amidst the decadence of `Freak Show Central', his personal nickname for New York City. In this contrived situation he finds life again and with these considerations Pacino's bravura performance is forgivable. 

Pacino ironically switches energies with O'Donnell's character being the Colonel's high energy defuses Charlie's depressed low energy. The Colonel is psyched for his weekend's desperate romp, `A little tour of pleasures', he says. Given this distinction in performances, Charlie should have been the suicidal one, the defeated one because O'Donnell walks around this film like a deer caught in the headlights and there really isn't anything inspiring or motivating about him. It would have been an awesome acting exercise to have a young actor go against Pacino and realistically attempt to change his character's suicidal mission, granted his whole outlook on life yet what we have is a quick resolution that is very intense but not very intellectual. 

In the end, this movie somehow manages to conduct all it's emotional payoffs thus rendering the viewer at the mercy of what may seem bathos. Many have criticized the film as negotiating Hollywood Plot A with Plot B or C. However, the Colonel realizes his biggest failure in life was in his interpersonal relationships. He learns that sometimes having friends can be a stronger and more important bond than family- a point well taken. Sometimes when a film comes together, after all the pre and post production, the result can be undeniably charming and this film manages to soar above its foundations, those manifested in the most basic of premises of melodrama. `Scent Of A Woman' does inevitably work and it's a very heart-warming film."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":273092,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8},"duration":"PT2H36M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Hitchcock
programme.desc: Radnja filma portretira Hitchcockov odnos sa suprugom i njegovu stvaralačku krizu. U strahu da su neki drugi redatelji provokativniji od njega, Hitchcock se odlučio snimiti kontroverzni 'Psiho'... Biografska drama koncentrira se na odnos filmskog redatelja Alfreda Hitchcocka (A. Hopkins) i njegove supruge Alme Reville (H. Mirren) tijekom snimanja "Psiha", kontroverznog horora koji je postao jedno od najhvaljenijih i najutjecajnijih djela u redateljevoj karijeri. Snimljeno prema knjizi Stephena Rebella "Alfred Hitchcock and the Making of Psycho".

credits.actor: Robin Williams, Tim Robbins, Fran Drescher, Pamela Reed, Zack Norman, Annabella Sciorra, Paul Guilfoyle, Lori Petty

programme.title: Inkheart
Srce od tinte
programme.desc:
Inkheart: Directed by Iain Softley. With Brendan Fraser, Sienna Guillory, Eliza Bennett, Richard Strange. A teenage girl discovers her father has an amazing talent to bring characters out of their books and must try to stop a freed villain from destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero." data-id="main"/><script destroying them all, with the help of her father, her aunt, and a storybook's hero.","keywords":"overalls,minotaur character,rapunzel character,horror for children,crocodile","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0494238/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Growlyted"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fairly faithful, but bad ending.","reviewBody":"Cornelia Funke is my favourite author and so I was nervous about the transfer to the screen. I knew there would be inevitable cuts and changes, which could take the heart out of the story. The actors (with the exception of Helen Mirren) didn't match what I had in my head. Could they capture the in depth personalities? 

As it turned out, my casting concerns were unfounded, although there was an annoying line from Capricorn. (In the trailer, unfortunately.) The cuts are noticeable, but acceptable. Same goes for the majority of changes. I enjoyed the first two sections, but then came the ending. I won't say how it's changed, but it was WRONG. In fact it was so WRONG, that there will be difficulties sequel-wise.

The best way to enjoy Inkheart is to lose yourself in the book. I hope this film encourages viewers to do just that.

7/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":74624,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

Patuljci sa naslovnih strana
programme.desc: Directed by Milorad Milinkovic. With Gordan Kicic, Jelena Djukic, Milena Radulovic, Boris Milivojevic. For 40 year old Nikola, everyday life is just about producing the worst, the most vulgar reality shows and hidden cameras for TV. His life begins to change when he starts to mentor young girl pushed to be star by her ambitious mother. In turn of the events, Nikola starts to wonder if it is he who is the target of some hidden camera show.

Igmanski marš
programme.desc: Directed by Zdravko Sotra. With Tihomir Arsic, Zeljka Cvjetan, Branislav Lecic, Milan Strljic. Igman March is known as the 'second offensive'. After the fall of the Uzice Republic, for strengthening the grouping of enemies in December 1941, in the small town of Rudo in Bosnia, formed the First Proletarian Brigade, the first regular units of the National Liberation Army of Yugoslavia. One of her first major trials is Igman march known as the 'Second offensive'. In late January 1942 ...

programme.desc: Directed by Marija Perovic. With Olga Pakalovic, Branimir Popovic, Mijo Jurisic, Andrija Milosevic. Mina comes to the seaside mental hospital to find Andrej, who ended up there due to events from their common past that affected everybody's lives. programme.title: Nacionalna klasa
Nacionalna klasa
programme.desc: Directed by Goran Markovic. With Dragan Nikolic, Bogdan Diklic, Gorica Popovic, Rade Markovic. One week in a life of Branimir Mitrovic "Floyd", a young rally driver from the National Class (up to 785cc), dreaming of promotion to the higher category. He lives a carefree life of a Belgrade dandy boy, neglecting his girlfriend, avoiding his draft calls, and refusing to deal with any life responsibility in general. The decisive race on Saturday is only what he cares about.

I told them I was a Farmer"},"datePublished":"1990-01-19","description":"A lawyer defends her father accused of war crimes, but there is more to the case than she suspects.","keywords":"war crime,looking at oneself in a mirror,reference to the chicago bears,reference to the chicago cubs,columbia tristar","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0100211/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nmuk"},"dateCreated":"2004-09-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"You rock, Mr. Costa Gavras!","reviewBody":"Awright, I don't approve of all your politics, Mr. Costa Gavras, particularly in "State of Siege" and "Hanna K.", but in this one you truly excel, both in terms of authenticity and a willingness to stay unprovocative when dealing with a sensitive issue as the Holocaust. 

The movie is supposed to have been inspired by the real-life case of John Demjanjuk, an Ohio resident accused of war crimes at Treblinka and Sobibor, extradited to Israel for trial in the mid 80's. The movie even has a brief reference to this Demjanjuk guy when someone tries to pronounce his complicated last name in a conversation with Jessica Lange. Costa Gavras seems to be intrigued by our very perception of the Holocaust and our ambivalent approach toward it. Lawyer Ann Talbot's Hungarian-born father is accused of war crimes, her ex-father-in-law is somewhat scornful towards the inviolability of the Holocaust, and even had drinks with "those monsters" when the West used ex-Nazis as spies against Communism. Not to mention the difficulty of prosecuting war crimes 40 odd years later when justice can be won by either concocted evidence or the cunning of legal argument, and historical truth becomes less important. 

The courtroom scenes and dialogues are truly remarkable in their restraint, and give the viewer just enough background as is needed about the atrocities of Arrow Cross in Hungary between 1944 and 1945. Specially the testimony of one Mr. Bodai is awesome, that of man so much ravaged by horror that his delivery is almost a monotone, with little emotional difference between responding a "yes" and a "no".

But it is Jessica Lange that outshines everyone else in performance, may be one of her best ever."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7152,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.4},"duration":"PT2H4M"}</script><metacontent="

type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt6476140/","name":"Serenity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2VjNGFkZmUtMTI1MS00YmRiLTg1MmUtYzI0ODM1OWRkMjIyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyOTIxNTAyMzU@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000190/","name":"Matthew seems."},"datePublished":"2019-01-25","description":"A fishing boat captain juggles facing his mysterious past and finding himself ensnared in a reality where nothing is what it seems.","keywords":"fishing boat,video game world,neo noir,tuna,fishing","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6476140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Joetampa90"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Original and Bonkers Cinema Needs More Movies like Serenity.","reviewBody":"When I first saw the trailer for Serenity back in summer 2018 I was certainly intrigued. Then it was pushed back many months from its original release date but I still looked forward to finally seeing the movie. Well I can say now that after some thought, I enjoyed the film. It was spoiled for me mildly in the sense that I knew an off the wall twist was in the cards. Boy was that twist a wild one.

Serenity starts out a little wonky with the first 20 minutes or so having some unintentional laugh out loud moments. However once it gets going it becomes very intriguing and had me fully engaged. When the left field insane twist is revealed, I was impressed by the sheer nerve of it all. Sure it's beyond over the top, but having the audacity to do it is a thing to admire.

The acting is both good and bad at times. The whole movie always just feels a little off and bizarre, which I somewhat appreciate. Make no mistake about it though this work is not a masterpiece. Serenity has its share of faults and the ending could very well be one of them in some ways. Besides that it's also a messy script with some big head scratchers and horrible lines.

With that being said we need more wide release movies with quality actors taking chances and giving us something original. In a way the film is throwback to the 70's and 80's when we saw wide released movies taking experimental chances.

Go give it a watch, love it or hate I think this work is something any true film fan will tip their cap to.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37825,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

noir,tuna,fishing","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6476140/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Joetampa90"},"dateCreated":"2019-01-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Original and Bonkers Cinema Needs More Movies like Serenity.","reviewBody":"When I first saw the trailer for Serenity back in summer 2018 I was certainly intrigued. Then it was pushed back many months from its original release date but I still looked forward to finally seeing the movie. Well I can say now that after some thought, I enjoyed the film. It was spoiled for me mildly in the sense that I knew an off the wall twist was in the cards. Boy was that twist a wild one.

Serenity starts out a little wonky with the first 20 minutes or so having some unintentional laugh out loud moments. However once it gets going it becomes very intriguing and had me fully engaged. When the left field insane twist is revealed, I was impressed by the sheer nerve of it all. Sure it's beyond over the top, but having the audacity to do it is a thing to admire.

The acting is both good and bad at times. The whole movie always just feels a little off and bizarre, which I somewhat appreciate. Make no mistake about it though this work is not a masterpiece. Serenity has its share of faults and the ending could very well be one of them in some ways. Besides that it's also a messy script with some big head scratchers and horrible lines.

With that being said we need more wide release movies with quality actors taking chances and giving us something original. In a way the film is throwback to the 70's and 80's when we saw wide released movies taking experimental chances.

Go give it a watch, love it or hate I think this work is something any true film fan will tip their cap to.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37825,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

noir,tuna,fishing","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt6476140/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Joetampa90","dateCreated":"2019-01-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Original and Bonkers Cinema Needs More Movies like Serenity.","reviewBody":"When I first saw the trailer for Serenity back in summer 2018 I was certainly intrigued. Then it was pushed back many months from its original release date but I still looked forward to finally seeing the movie. Well I can say now that after some thought, I enjoyed the film. It was spoiled for me mildly in the sense that I knew an off the wall twist was in the cards. Boy was that twist a wild one.

Serenity starts out a little wonky with the first 20 minutes or so having some unintentional laugh out loud moments. However once it gets going it becomes very intriguing and had me fully engaged. When the left field insane twist is revealed, I was impressed by the sheer nerve of it all. Sure it's beyond over the top, but having the audacity to do it is a thing to admire.

The acting is both good and bad at times. The whole movie always just feels a little off and bizarre, which I somewhat appreciate. Make no mistake about it though this work is not a masterpiece. Serenity has its share of faults and the ending could very well be one of them in some ways. Besides that it's also a messy script with some big head scratchers and horrible lines.

With that being said we need more wide release movies with quality actors taking chances and giving us something original. In a way the film is throwback to the 70's and 80's when we saw wide released movies taking experimental chances.

Go give it a watch, love it or hate I think this work is something any true film fan will tip their cap to.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":37825,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.4,"duration":"PT1H46M"</script><metacontent="

Max Frye"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Palmetto","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2577072409","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2JhY2UyN2YtNzA4Ni00NmE4LWIxMDktNGU2ZGU2OTNjMGM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2JhY2UyN2YtNzA4Ni00NmE4LWIxMDktNGU2ZGU2OTNjMGM4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"datePublished":"1998-02-20","description":"A recently released ex-con gets involved in a fake kidnapping scheme that turns very real.","keywords":"tied to a chair,fake kidnapping,scam,infidelity,extramarital affair","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120782/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rob-236"},"dateCreated":"1999-05-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Slick And Entertaining","reviewBody":"This slick thriller is entertaining from start to finish. Harrelson plays Harry Barber an ex con who is lured by mega rich temptress Rhea Malroux (Elizabeth Shue) in to helping set up a straight forward bogus kidnap scheme involving her stepdaughter Odette (Chloe Sevigny) It seems simple, he can earn a lot of money for doing very little. As the plot thickens Harry finds out that things, and people, are not what they seem and that is where the trouble begins. Harrelson is convincing in the lead and Sevigny is very good as the rich kid, although Elizabeth Shue tends to overact her part. The biggest crime in this film is that of Gina Gershon, who seems wasted in a weak role as Harry's girlfriend. The film on a whole is good though, and because of this you can almost forgive a 'Batman' style ending!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":7638,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"duration":"PT1H54M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory

programme.desc: Conspiracy Theory: Directed by Richard Donner. With Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart, Cylk Cozart. A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0118883/","name":"Conspiracy Theory","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjQ1MTYxMzA4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjg2NTM1MTI@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000154/","name":"Mel Gibson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000210/","name":"Julia Roberts"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001772/","name":"Patrick Stewart"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001149/","name":"Richard Donner"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0019968/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0116435/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001338/","name":"Brian Helgeland"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Conspiracy Theory","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2059338009","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzdhMmUzNTctMTZlOC00Yjk5LWIyNjItODM5YThkMjc4MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNzdhMmUzNTctMTZlOC00Yjk5LWIyNjItODM5YThkMjc4MmY5XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Home Video"},"datePublished":"1997-08-08","description":"A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. Unfortunately, to save himself, he has to figure out which theory it is.","keywords":"biting someone's nose,hospital,talking while driving,on the run,surveillance","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0118883/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"AaronCapenBanner"},"dateCreated":"2013-09-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Which Theory Is True?","reviewBody":"Mel Gibson is most sympathetic as conspiracy theorist Jerry Fletcher, who lives in a ultra-secure, booby trapped apartment where he publishes his newsletter critical of the government. Ironically, he loves government employee Alice Sutton(played by Julia Roberts) from afar. One day, their worlds collide when one of Jerry's theories seems to be true, as he becomes the target of assassination, and Alice helps him to go on the run from the unknown government forces. He thinks that Dr. Jonas(Patrick Stewart) will help him, but it turns out that was one conspiracy he didn't anticipate...\n\nEntertaining thriller is well directed by Richard Donner, with a good pace and reasonably believable story, though it does go on a bit too long, and becomes a bit too convoluted, but otherwise this film works well, and some of Jerry's theories may not be so nutty anymore...","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":95519,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"duration":"PT2H15M"}</script><metacontent="

solace, at first, in her imaginary friend.","keywords":"death of pet,psychologist,bathtub,smothered with a pillow,pushed out a window","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0382077/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"the-movie-guy"},"dateCreated":"2005-02-04","inLanguage":"English","name":"Good little suspenseful thriller","reviewBody":"After the suicide of his wife (Amy Irving), David Callaway (Robert De Niro) takes his mentally disturbed 9-year-old daughter, Emily (Dakota Fanning) to a new home in the country in upstate New York. Instead of getting better, Emily begins to withdraw further, and she announces to her father that she has a new imaginary friend named "Charlie." At first, her father sees Charlie as a way for Emily to express her feelings. Then a series of vicious acts such as menacing writings appearing on the bathroom walls, and other mysterious occurrences start happening around the house. David blames Emily for doing them, but Emily says that Charlie did it. But is Charlie imaginary? You'd have to ask Emily, who is the only one who can see Charlie. Charlie may actually be both real and very dangerous. The movie is well crafted and suspenseful with a great cast. For a thriller, I did jump a few times. The ending was a little disappointing, but not unpredictable. (20th Century Fox, Run time 1:40, Rated R)(8/10)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82569,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H41M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Angel Heart
Anđeosko srce
programme.desc:
Angel Heart: Directed by Alan Parker. With Mickey Rourke, Robert De Niro, Lisa Bonet, Charlotte Rampling. A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0092563/","name":"Angel Heart","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZmQ3Mzg3YjgtNTA1Zi00ODgyLTkyZGUtYTE5NDA5ZmI4NjI1L2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTA0MjU0Ng@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"X","genre":["Horror","Mystery","Thriller"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000620/","name":"Mickey Rourke"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000956/","name":"Lisa Bonet"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000271/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0113566/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0077127/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0387132/","name":"William Hjortsberg"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000570/","name":"Alan Parker"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Angel Heart","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4172677401","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMwNmE3YTAtMjFhZi00MWJmLWI1ZTMtYjFlY2NkZjY1NjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjMwNmE3YTAtMjFhZi00MWJmLWI1ZTMtYjFlY2NkZjY1NjdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"},"datePublished":"1987-03-06","description":"A private investigator is hired by a man who calls himself Louis Cyphre to track down a singer named Johnny Favorite. But the investigation takes an unexpected and somber turn.","keywords":"detective,voodoo,private eye,lucifer morningstar character,woman in a bathtub","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0092563/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Sleepin_Dragon"},"dateCreated":"2020-10-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"A superb movie.","reviewBody":"Such an impressive movie, if like me you're a fan of noir, or neo noir, then you will absolutely love this movie.

The first thing you will be struck by is the appearance of the film, it is a visual masterpiece, the attention to detail is flawless, you could actually turn the colour off, and imagine this being made in 1955.

Secondly, the atmosphere, smoke filled rooms, the clothes, music, accents, just awesome to behold, they got the tone spot on.

It's a great story, it takes a few moments for you to know what's happening, and get the direction, but you will.

Finally the acting, Rourke is at his absolute best, one of the best films I've seen him in, he is tremendous, it's so nice to see him in his handsome pre surgery years. De Niro, what can you say, he's just incredible.

Captivating, 9/10.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":82505,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3},"duration":"PT1H53M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Gregory Harrison, Robert Collins, Rebecca Jenkins, Steve Whistance-Smith, Nahanni Johnstone, Maury Chaykin
Billy Connolly, Paul Walker, Frances O'Connor, Gerard Butler, Ethan Embry, Anna Friel, Csókás Márton

programme.title: Anđeosko srce
programme.desc: Harry Angel (Mickey Rourke) je privanti detektiv koji primi neobičan telefonski poziv. Naime, dojavljeno mu je da ispita sotonistčki kult u Harlemu. Harry Angel (Mickey Rourke) je privanti detektiv koji primi neobičan telefonski poziv. Naime, dojavljeno mu je da ispita sotonistčki kult u Harlemu gdje nepoznati muškarac želi razgovarati s njim. Čovjek se zove Louis Cyphre i traži od Harryja da mu nađe nestalu osobu. Harry za pet tisuća dolara prihvaća posao i slijedi trag označen mnogobrojnim leševima. Harryja će istraga iz New Yorka odvesti u Louisianu, gdje u hotelu susreće mladu ženu tajanstvene prošlosti Epiphany Proudfoot, s kojom se upušta u ljubavnu vezu. Iako je upozoren da se ne miješa ondje gdje mu nije mjesto, Harry ne odustaje i sve se dublje upleće u mračnu priču zabranjenih rituala voodoo kulta...

credits.actor: Gregory Harrison, Robert Collins, Rebecca Jenkins, Steve Whistance-Smith, Nahanni Johnstone, Maury Chaykin

programme.title: Conspiracy Theory
Teorija zavjere
programme.desc: Conspiracy Theory: Directed by Richard Donner. With Mel Gibson, Julia Roberts, Patrick Stewart, Cylk Cozart. A taxi driver with a penchant for conspiracy theories becomes a target after one of these theories turns out to be true. programme.title: Francuska veza
programme.desc: Džimi Popej Dojl i Badi Klaudi Ruso dvojica su njujorških detektiva zaposlenih u agenciji za narkotike. Dopadne im zadatak da prekinu lanac transporta heroina iz južne Francuske u Sjedinjene Države. Džimi Popaj Dojl i Badi Klaudi Ruso dvojica su njujorških detektiva zaposlenih u agenciji za narkotike. Dobjaju zadatak da prekinu lanac transporta heroina iz južne Francuske u Sjedinjene Države. Saznavši tokom istrage da se radi o velikoj pošiljci droge, trag ih dovede do njujorške trgovine slatkišima čiji bi vlasnici, Sal Broka i njegova supruga Endži, mogli biti umešani u slučaj. Istovremeno, u francuskom gradu Marseju, otmeni bogataš Alain Čarnier, "kralj" lokalnog narkomiljea, organizuje poslove vezane uz prodaju heroina Amerikancima. Kako je informisan o napredovanju istrage Popaja i Klaudija, odluči ih ukloniti i osigurati protok droge.

credits.actor: Denzel Washington, Tom Sizemore, Jennifer Beals, Maury Chaykin, Don Cheadle, Terry Kinney
